name: Rock Bottom (Glutamatkrieger)
description:
Rock Bottom is an epic rhythm-based puzzle platformer, in which you play as the most beautiful rock, living his life in peace only to be cursed by a jealous wizard! Now whenever the music goes quiet gorgeous rock can't move anymore!

Ungravel this epic revenge story and show that evil wizard that no curse can destroy your stone cold determination! Will you be able to partake in such arduous task, or will you hit rock bottom?

The game can be controlled using the keyboard as well as a gamepad.

- Controls -

Keyboard

Movement: Arrow Keys
Jumping: Space Bar
End Game: Esc

Controller

Movement: Analogue Stick & D-Pad
Jumping: A (X - Dual Shock; B - Joycon)

ATTENTION

There is a bug in which the timing inverts on level load/reload, we might fix this issue after the jam, but till then jumping off a cliff or into the next best enemy should restart the level properly.
The game might run badly on older machines, if so it is unplayable as the music, which is a vital part of the gameplay, will not synchronize. We know of no possible solution, but recommend setting the CPU-priority of the game to "High" or higher as possible fix.
